Templates.Title: Area of Rectangle
Templates.Description:
mov ax,6 ; length of rectangle
mov bx,5 ; width of rectangle
mul bx; calculate area=ax*bx
mov cx,6; now we will calculate the perimeter in sha Allah
mov dx,5; 
add dx,dx; dx=dx+dx
add cx,cx; cx=cx+cx
add cx,dx; perimeter=cx+dx

Templates.Title: Average of three numbers
Templates.Description:
mov ax,3 
mov bx,6
mov cx,5
add ax,bx
add ax,cx
mov dx,3
div dx

Templates.Title: Bitwise Instructions Demo
Templates.Description:
MOV AX,6
MOV BX,4
AND AX,BX
XOR AX,BX
TEST AX,BX
OR AX,BX
NOT BX
NOP

Templates.Title: Jumps
Templates.Description:
MOV AX,4
CMP AX,1
JE ONE
CMP AX,2
JE TWO
CMP AX,3
JE THREE
CMP AX,4
JE FOUR
ONE: MOV DX,1
JMP END
TWO: MOV DX,2
JMP END
THREE: MOV DX,3
JMP END
FOUR: MOV DX,4
END: NOP

Templates.Title: Factorial Calculation
Templates.Description:
NOP; TASK: calculate 4!=24 in AX
MOV CX,4
MOV AX,1
MULTIPLY:MUL CL
LOOP MULTIPLY

Templates.Title: I/O Demo
Templates.Description:
MOV AH,1
INT 21H
MOV AH,2
MOV DL,35H
INT 21H
NOP

Templates.Title: Flag Instructions Demo
Templates.Description:
STC
CLC
CMC
CLI
STD
CLD
HLT
